What blocks students pursuing higher achievements in East Boston?

The high school in East Boston are suffering lower graduation rate than the other parts in the whole Massachusetts state. What lacks them achieve better in high school? Porverty, early performance, or family attitude? East Boston High has lots of EEL(English language learners) who has difficulties in fit in the English leasrning situation. Are they struggling or quitting? This project aims at figuring out the situation in East Boston and find the story behind the data.

By Chenrui Ye

The probable reasons lack the students’ acedamic achievement


Does these reasons really lack the students performance?

The scatter plot above shows correlations between probable reasons and the graduation rate, showing all public high school in Boston. Choosing East Boston High to represent the East Boston situation is meaningful because that is the bigger one between the only two high schools in that district. Accordingly, the East Boston High does have higher EEL rate, higher low income rate and lower graduation rate, compared with Massachusetts.


How about East Boston compared with the city and the State?

Visualizing Eastie is a project of the Information Design and Visualization program at Northeastern University. © 2018
